data.message: Want Reading Glasses cheaper then any department store? Visit my store at http://stores.ebay.com/Brians-Helpful-Elements My reading glasses are only $4 and I don't have any Glasses worth more then 5.50$That's right you can buy 4 pairs in my store for $16 as opposed to 1 pair in dept store which will be 15$I also sell Pill Crushers,Pill Cutters,Pill Organizers,Yard Sale Stickers.Furniture Sliders,Flash Cards Please be sure to visit my store which is once again http://stores.ebay.com/Brians-Helpful-Elements
